00047 struct Vector3D
00048 {
00049     Vector3D( double dx = 0.0, double dy = 0.0, double dz = 0.0 );

00055     Vector3D& operator-=( const Vector3D& vector );

00060     bool operator!=( const Vector3D& vector ) const;

00062     double& operator[]( int i );
00063     double LengthSquared( ) const;
00064     double Length( ) const;
00065 
00066     double x;
00067     double y;
00068     double z;
00069 };
